headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Loses 249 Points; Nvidia Extends A Streak As Palantir Does This (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major indexes ended the day Tuesday with considerable losses, but improved from the day's lows.  The Dow was weighed down by Nvidia, although the majority of names closed lower.  Also, Warren Buffett stewed over the Kraft Heinz breakup on the stock market today.

headline: 2 Unpopular Stocks That Should Get More Attention and 1 We Ignore
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.
